title: Collaborative Hashtag Mathematics Curriculum Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of elementary mathematics curriculum and basic smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: A course where practicing elementary teachers collaboratively develop socially relevant mathematics education materials using smartphones, considering accessibility in restricted technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically classify digital mathematics education resources using five or more hashtags.
Learners can collaboratively create one or more social issue-linked mathematics lesson plans (hashtag-based lesson plans) with peers.
Learners enhance information literacy skills to critically evaluate information resources using smartphone-based tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
